CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels , absorption spectra and band gaps of the resulting polymers were well tuned by utilizing different thiophene derivatives as spacer between IDT and NT units , and polymer PIDT-C12NT which employed bithiophene attached with dodecyl side chain as spacer exhibited superior properties compared to the other two copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers |
| IDT units |
| NT units |
| polymer PIDT-C12NT |
| bithiophene |
| dodecyl side chain |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers (specific types not mentioned: IDT, NT, PIDT-C12NT) |
| IDT units |
| NT units |
| polymer PIDT-C12NT |
| bithiophene |

Note: The term "units" in the original paragraph is not clear enough to be considered a material name, so it was removed from the table.
